exceptions.exn: In environment worlds : Type R : Relation worlds po_R : PreOrder Krelation J : Join worlds SA : SeparationAlgebra worlds uSA : UpwardsClosedSeparationAlgebra worlds Unable to unify "IncreasingSeparationAlgebra worlds" with "Join worlds".

exceptions.tactic: intros x Hx y Hy Hxy.

original: apply (Build_IncreasingSeparationAlgebra worlds R J). intros x Hx y Hy Hxy. apply (increasing worlds R J x y). apply Hxy.
